Comments_List: I learned how the process of scenic design works. I now feel comfortable researching and communicating scenic design ideas I may have.
I learned more about research informs design, and how you can not only support a narrative but create one through an environment.
The small size of the class allowed for some great and intimate critiques/discussion.  I only wish we had more time in the class, there were so many topics that we did not get to spend time on.
It would be nice to visit a theatre and have a lesson in there working with actual space and trying to design it.
Yes! Alan taught me things that have me thinking about space (for theater) in new and impactful ways.

Yes I would, this class offers a great application of using research. You get to dive deep into a period of history and try to understand what the world looked like. The class teaches the importance of good research because your set design relies on it.  It is also interesting see how everyone can create such different sets with the same play, themes, and historical information.
